text:
Terrene | Full-Stack Python Developer | Waterloo, ON, Canada | FULL TIME, INTERN, ONSITE

We are building APIs for training, deployment, and optimization of deep learning neural networks. We're a small team (3 people) and we're looking for someone who is comfortable with django-rest-framework, pandas/numpy/pytorch, and vue.

If this is something you find interesting, please shoot me an email at kash@terrene.co
